unnormalised: Athlete biographies are my go-to! Learning about PV Sindhu's rigorous training in Hyderabad is inspiring. Did you know Milkha Singh faced immense hardship? His life story, and the film "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag", shows true grit. It reminds me of the dedication at the National Sports Institute, Patiala. So many dreams are forged there, 100s of km away from comfort. Kudos to them! Real heros. Rs. 100 well spent on these books.
normalised: Athlete biographies are my go to! Learning about P V Sindhu's rigorous training in Hyderabad is inspiring. Did you know Milkha Singh faced immense hardship? His life story, and the film "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag", shows true grit. It reminds me of the dedication at the National Sports Institute, Patiala. So many dreams are forged there, hundreds of kilometer away from comfort. Kudos to them! Real heros. Rupee one hundred well spent on these books.
